name: My Theater
description: With this app, you can be the artist responsible for the implementation of audio-visual artistic work that can be used in theater, cinema, radio, etc. Simply select the repertoire, background music and sound effects to assemble a panel of sounds ready to play exactly as it was designed to play.   No ads. Allows you to play up to 04 sounds simultaneously. Allows you to add up to 32 sounds for each profile. Unlimited number of profiles. Individual volume controls.
